name: Easter Bunny's Big Day
description: Easter Bunny's Big Day is a collection of minigames including jigsaw puzzles, memory matching, and egg catching. The game follows the Easter Bunny, who collects an egg after completing each minigame. Once enough eggs have been collected, Robo-Rabbit brings them to a nearby school, and after powering him up, the game congratulates the player and credits roll.
